timeline.bodyText: The comment (and also the method name) should include that this only gets exercises after the exam is over!
timeline.author: jpbernius

timeline.bodyText: not related to this PR as this is reusing existing code, but userHasPermission should have a better name to indicate the check for Instructor OR TA in the course.
timeline.author: jpbernius
jpbernius

timeline.bodyText: Do we also need a check like that for other exercise types? If so, I would move this into the AccountService. Otherwise, it is fine.
timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText: Added isAtLeastInstructorInCourseForExam(exercise: Exercise) that takes an exercise instead of a course and does the case distinction
replies.author: JonasPetry

timeline.bodyText:
Could this be a getter? :D
Otherwise, please add this to resetComponent() as well.
timeline.author: jpbernius

replies.bodyText: I think it should not be a getter because the exercise (where we get the course from) is not always initialised. I've set it to 0 in the resetComponent().
replies.author: JonasPetry

timeline.bodyText: Not sure if this is a good idea.
timeline.author: jpbernius

timeline.bodyText: I think i would pass the user as an argument to this method.
